name: Untitled Platformer Game (Lamb_Sauce, SimplyExisting)
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #20. Made by myself and Exist.

Lore: 

Whilst traveling with your friends an earthquake causes your party to become separated. it also opened up many underground chambers, long forgotten by man, which you have fallen into. After spending the night in a hole you hear a voice calling to you from somewhere deeper under the surface. Gathering your things you set out to find your friends and find this mysterious voice. But little do your friends know, it has somethings instore for them...

Warning: Contains Low Violence and Blood
